### Set the key:
- [Best Practices for API Key Safety](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/5112595-best-practices-for-api-key-safety)

### Start the program:
```cmd
>> streamlit run main.py
```
  
### Available functions:
  - Media processing
  - Create document index
  - Q&A using LLM
